May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
The power-Uncommon [I]ne plus ultra[/I] for Sealed. Look at the range, look at the stats. Look at the average dial length of everything else in this set. Your opponent has to hit a 19 (probably a 21) for five damage before his numbers drop even a bit. Yeah, 100 points is a high price for three clicks. A very high price. But what did you pull that's going to do better with 100 points than this?
May 3, 2022
Goop
Yeah 200pts is a lot but he can really bring some high damage with RCE and PSYblast and is hard to bring down. Improved targeting is excellent for him too. You do really need that Super Rare cloak to get the best value from him though. Its good to see a heavy beat stick in the uncommon slot. I prefer him at his lower line for half the cost.
